    Package Description

    • Uses of CreateDiffuserRequest in org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.request

      Methods in org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.request that return CreateDiffuserRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.appendArgumentType(java.lang.String argumentType)
      Adds a method argument, represented as the argument's fully-qualified Class name.
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.appendClassPath(java.lang.String classPath)
      Adds an address to which the RestfulDiffuser will look to load Class objects it cannot find locally.
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.appendClientEndpoints(java.lang.String clientEndpoint)
      Adds an addresses to which the RestfulDiffuser will send methods to be executed.
      static CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.create(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classPaths, java.lang.String className, java.lang.String methodName, java.lang.String returnTypeClassName, java.lang.String... argumentTypes)
      Creates a request to create a diffuser that acts on the specified method of the class name, and has the specified argument types.
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setArgumentTypes(java.util.List<java.lang.String> argumentTypes)
      Sets the list of fully-qualified Class names of the method's arguments
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setClassPaths(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classPaths)
      Sets the list of the addresses to which the RestfulDiffuser will look to load Class objects it cannot find locally.
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setClientEndpoints(java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientEndpoints)
      Sets the list of addresses to which the RestfulDiffuser will send methods to be executed.
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setContainingClass(java.lang.String className)
      Sets the fully qualified class name of the class containing the method to diffuse
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setMethodName(java.lang.String methodName)
      Sets the name of the method which to diffuse
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setReturnTypeClass(java.lang.String returnClassName)
      Sets the fully-qualified Class name of the return object
      CreateDiffuserRequest CreateDiffuserRequest.setSerializerType(java.lang.String serializer)
      Sets the name of the Serializer as represented by the SerializerFactory

      javax.ws.rs.core.Response RestfulDiffuserManagerResource.create(javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo, CreateDiffuserRequest request)
      Creates a RestfulDiffuser using the information specified in the CreateDiffuserRequest object.
